mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY.COMM_ID, COMMUNITY.CAT, COMMUNITY.TAG, COMMUNITY.TITLE, USERS.NICKNAME, COMMUNITY.CREATE_DATE, COMMUNITY.RECOMMEND, COMMUNITY.VIEWS, COMMUNITY.CTT, COMMUNITY.IMAGE FROM COMMUNITY JOIN USERS ON COMMUNITY.USER_ID = USERS.USER_ID WHERE COMM_ID=#{commid}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE COMM_ID = #{commid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY(COMM_ID, TITLE, CAT, CTT, CREATE_DATE, USER_ID, RECOMMEND, VIEWS, TAG,IMAGE) VALUES(COMM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{cat}, #{ctt}, SYSDATE, #{user_id}, #{recommend}, #{views},#{tag},#{image})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET RECOMMEND = RECOMMEND + 1 WHERE COMM_ID = #{commid}
mapper.select: SELECT RECOMMEND FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMM_ID = #{commid}
